appearances.title: Rep. María Elvira Salazar Discusses U.S. Immigration Policy : CSPAN : January 15, 2026 12:33pm-1:10pm EST
appearances.snippet: we know now that we have this bill giving all the credit to veronica escobar from texas who has beeny cosponsor, she has been very brave within her party , within the democratic party, she has encountered some harsh criticism because it does not include path to citizenship. it gives a new hope to those people gave debt -- that are dying of fear that could not contribute. kudos and my deepest appreciation. ms. escobari: we are glad that somebody with your perseverance is on this case. rep. salazar: i was in journalism. ms. escobari: i wanted to ask one last question. to get a message to the latino community, polling numbers shows that people are living in fear. they are not going to church, they are not going to work. absenteeism has skyrocketed. what is your message to them? what does dignity mean for this community? rep. salazar: i feel them and that is why i am doing this. i know there are millions and millions of people i do not know and maybe they don't know the dignity law was written with that -- but i feel them and i know that no human being should live with no criminal record
